response.message:
Failed to retrieve system stats: (psycopg2.errors.InvalidTextRepresentation) invalid input value for enum appointmentstatus: "scheduled"
LINE 4: WHERE appointment.status = 'scheduled') AS anon_1
                                   ^

[SQL: SELECT count(*) AS count_1 
FROM (SELECT appointment.id AS appointment_id, appointment.appointment_type AS appointment_appointment_type, appointment.patient_id AS appointment_patient_id, appointment.hospital_id AS appointment_hospital_id, appointment.doctor_id AS appointment_doctor_id, appointment.slot_id AS appointment_slot_id, appointment.booked_by_user_id AS appointment_booked_by_user_id, appointment.status AS appointment_status, appointment.scheduled_time AS appointment_scheduled_time, appointment.created_at AS appointment_created_at, appointment.reason AS appointment_reason 
FROM appointment 
WHERE appointment.status = %(status_1)s) AS anon_1]
[parameters: {'status_1': 'scheduled'}]
(Background on this error at: https://sqlalche.me/e/20/9h9h)

recommendations: Consider implementing CAPTCHA after 3 failed attempts
Review access for doctor_smith at unusual hours
